trans-unit.source: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as dimensões das margens de uma página impressa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> class is used to manipulate the width of margins in <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> classe é usada para manipular a largura das margens em <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter> is the type descriptor for this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter> é o descritor de tipo para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> are properties that define the margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> são propriedades que definem as margens.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A> creates an identical <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A> cria um idênticos <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A> determines if another object has the same dimensions as a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A> Determina se o outro objeto tem as mesmas dimensões como um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins of 1 inch on each side.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define o padrão configurações de página de um documento para as margens de 1 polegada em cada lado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> class with 1-inch wide margins.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> com margens de 1 polegada de largura.

trans-unit.source: The left margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem esquerda, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The right margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem direita, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The top margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem superior, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem inferior, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> class with the specified left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> com as margens esquerda, direita, superior e inferior especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins of 1 inch width on each side.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define o padrão configurações de página de um documento para as margens da largura de 1 polegada em cada lado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="left" /> parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor do parâmetro <paramref name="left" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="right" /> parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor do parâmetro <paramref name="right" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="top" /> parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor do parâmetro <paramref name="top" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bottom" /> parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor do parâmetro <paramref name="bottom" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem inferior, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem inferior, em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> membro 98.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define as configurações de página padrão para um documento para as margens esquerda e direita de 1 polegada na largura e superior e margens inferior de 1,5 polegadas de largura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> está definida com um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a duplicate of this object, member by member.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma cópia deste objeto, membro por membro.

trans-unit.source: A duplicate of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma duplicata deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object to which to compare this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ao qual comparar este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to determine whether they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Compara este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado para determinar se eles têm as mesmas dimensões.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> and has the same <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" /> values as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> e tiver os mesmos valores de <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" /> que este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Calculates and retrieves a hash code based on the width of the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Calcula e recupera um código hash com base na largura das margens esquerda, direita, superior e inferior.

trans-unit.source: A hash code based on the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash com base nas margens esquerda, direita, superior e inferior.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem esquerda em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem esquerda em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> membro 98.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define as configurações de página padrão para um documento para as margens esquerda e direita de 1 polegada na largura e superior e margens inferior de 1,5 polegadas de largura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" /> property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" /> está definida com um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> a comparar quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> a comparar quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to determine if they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> para determinar se eles têm as mesmas dimensões.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" />, and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> properties of both margins have the same value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> de ambas as margens têm o mesmo valor; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> a comparar quanto à desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> a comparar quanto à desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to determine whether they are of unequal width.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> para determinar se eles são de larguras diferentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" />, or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> properties of both margins are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" />, <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom" /> de ambas as margens não são iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem direita em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem direita, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplicar 3.937 e o resultado é 98 arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> membro 98.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define as configurações de página padrão para um documento para as margens esquerda e direita de 1 polegada na largura e superior e margens inferior de 1,5 polegadas de largura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" /> property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right" /> está definida com um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem superior em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem superior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> membro 98.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define as configurações de página padrão para um documento para as margens esquerda e direita de 1 polegada na largura e superior e margens inferior de 1,5 polegadas de largura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" /> property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top" /> está definida com um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> em uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de <see cref="T:System.String" /> do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" />.
